most all station uses of these programs.
In conclusion, we repeat that this is the first year of Network self-support,
a very critical year. As your Network Headquarters attempts to serve you, it
will continue to need the seme support its members have given it in the past.
Respectfully submitted by:
John Holt
Network Manager
